College: Institute of Home Economics, New Delhi
Eligiblity: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Home Science / B.Sc. (Pass) in Home Science: after (10+2) from Delhi University or any other University whose Examination is recognized by the University of Delhi as equivalent and fulfill other conditions of eligibility. Should have passed any three subjects in the following areas: Fundamentals of Fabric and Apparel Science / Fabric Science / Indian Textile Heritage / Apparel Construction / Applied Textile Design / Dyeing and Printing / Design Concepts / Fashion Design Development / Fashion Studies
Course_Detail: Master of Science in Fabric and Apparel Science is two years full time course. Affiliated to University of Delhi, Delhi and approved by UGC. The two-year Master's degree programme was started in 1987 at IHE and has since come a long way. The course contents have been revised from the academic year, 2007-08 to make it more contextual and industry related. While 50% of the seats are filled on the basis of merit from B.Sc. (Home Science) Hons. , the remaining seats are filled by an entrance examination conducted by the Department of Home Science in early July. The department churns out professionals every year who get excellent placements in the apparel industry in designing, marketing & merchandising as well as in Universities, Schools & Research Institutes. Many students also opt for self-employment & become entrepreneurs in

Candidates who have passed 10+2 examination in any stream (Science/Arts/Commerce) or an equivalent examination** from any institute approved by Board/AICTE/ Recognized University with not less than 50% marks.
In case of students belonging to SC/ST, the minimum percentage of marks for admission to B. Des. course shall be not less than 45%.

Candidates must have passed HSLC or equivalent with a minimum of 45% in the aggregate and 50% of marks for GEN/OBC (45% of marks for ST/SC/PH candidates) in Science, Mathematics (or Advanced Mathematics) and English taken together.
The CITEE is an entrance test conducted by CIT for admission to Diploma course of study in different branches of engineering in CIT, Kokrajhar, which is affiliated to State Council of Technical Education, Assam.

Eligiblity: Candidates should have passed Class XII from any recognized board.QUALIFICATION :Indian Qualification: Professional Diploma from Pearl Academy. Pearl Academy, Jaipur has been offered provisional affiliation from Rajasthan ILD Skill University (RISU) and will now offer Bachelor of Vocation degree (B.Voc.) in Fashion Design, Product & Lifestyle Design & Interior & Spatial DesignINTERNATIONAL QUALIFICATION: Option for a full credit transfer out of Pearl Academy, for the final year, to Bachelor of Design degree at Torrens University, Australia.
